title: Appeals Court Orders Jussie Smollett Be Released From Jail Pending Appeal
sub_head: Ruling comes days after former ‘Empire’ actor had begun serving 150-day jail sentence for reporting false hate crime
body:
Jussie Smollett left the Cook County Jail in Chicago Wednesday night after an appeals court ruled he could be released while appealing a conviction for reporting a false hate crime.
A Cook County judge last week sentenced the former “Empire” actor to 150 days in jail, beginning immediately, as the first stage of his 30 months of felony probation.
